title: Brooklyn Standard - Grand St
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, American, Salad bar, Juice bar, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Serves sandwiches, salads, wraps, smoothies, desserts and coffee. Offers a wide variety of clearly marked vegan choices such as tofu salad nicoise, a jerked seitan sandwich, barbecue tofu sandwich, potato salad and others. Most items have detailed ingredients. Also offers many vegan snacks, cookies, gum and more.
